title: Wanted 1887 Old Judge Keefe Galvin Nichols Poor Condition

posts.post_title: Wanted 1887 Old Judge Keefe Galvin Nichols Poor Condition
posts.post_content:
Hi.

Trying to complete my 300 game winners period piece collection.

Please let me know if you have any poor condition Old Judge cards of Tim Keefe, Pud Galvin or Kid Nichols for sale.

Thanks.

Ben
